title: The Slap
creator_credit: Penny Chapman, Tony Ayres, Helen Bowden, Michael McMahon and Matchbox Pictures
brief_description: The Slap is an Australian television drama series based on the multi-award-winning novel by Australian author Christos Tsiolkas, which explores what happens when a man slaps a child, who is not related to him, at a suburban barbecue.

constellations_other.name: Ana Kokkinos
constellations_other.description: The films and TV works of Ana Kokkinos often explore the experiences of second-generation Australians, queer identities and class. Since beginning her career in the early 90s, those stories have started to appear more frequently on Australian screens.

constellations_other.name: Tony Ayres
constellations_other.description: Charts the acclaimed career of Tony Ayres through his work in film and TV.

creator_credit_for_label: Penny Chapman, Tony Ayres, Helen Bowden, Michael McMahon and Matchbox Pictures
description: When a man slaps a 4-year-old boy, the incident results in an intense court case.
